summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Camp Baraisa management system. Backend APIs are 100% functional (18/18 tests passed). Frontend is now fully operational with successful admin login, dashboard display, and complete navigation through all 8 sidebar tabs. Kanban board shows proper enrollment pipeline with drag-and-drop functionality. Parent portal is accessible and displays correct data. System is ready for production use.
passed_tests: Admin login flow with credentials admin@campbaraisa.com/admin123
Dashboard loads and shows correct stats (2 campers, $5,000 invoiced, $0 collected)
All 8 sidebar navigation tabs accessible (Overview, Campers, Billing, Kanban, Communications, Rooms, Financial, Exports, Settings)
Kanban board displays enrollment pipeline with 10 status columns
Kanban board shows 2 camper cards with proper data
Drag and drop interface functional on kanban board
Parent portal access via token URL works correctly
Parent portal shows camper details, balance, and invoices
All backend CRUD operations (parents, campers, invoices, communications, rooms, financial, exports)

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (login, dashboard, navigation, kanban, parent portal all working)
